title: Savory Toast
text:
Preheat Oven: NA



Prep Time: 10 Minutes



Cook Time: 5 Minutes

title: Savory Toast
text:
Ingredients



two slices of bread
pesto





hard boilded egg (or tinned fish)
sun dried tomatoes and oil

title: Savory Toast
text:
Directions

Toast the bread and add a layer of pesto.
Cut up a hard boiled egg and place on top of pesto with sun dried tomatoes and oil.

title: Desserts
text:
Contents
Chocolate Chip Cookie

title: Chocloalte Chip Cookies
text:
Preheat Oven: 350 Degrees F



Prep Time: 15 Minutes



Cook Time: 10 Minutes

title: Chocloalte Chip Cookies
text:
Ingredients



1 cup of softened butter
1 cup of white sugar
1 cup of brown sugar
2 tsp of vanilla extract
2 eggs (room temp.)
2 tsp hot water





1 tsp baking soda
\(\frac{1}{2}\) tsp salt
\(\frac{1}{2}\) tsp of baking powder
3 cups of flour
1 cup of chocolate chips

title: Chocloalte Chip Cookies
text:
Directions

Preheat oven to 350 degree F.
Beat together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in an electric mixer.
Beat in eggs one at a time, and then stir in the vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda into hot water. Add to batter, along with salt.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake about 10 minutes, until edges are nicely browned.

title: Chocloalte Chip Cookies
text:
Sources
Best Chocolate Chip Cookies

title: Spritz Cookies
text:
Preheat Oven: 400 Degrees F



Prep Time: 15 Minutes



Cook Time: 6-9 Minutes

title: Spritz Cookies
text:
Ingredients



1 cup of softened butter
\(\frac{1}{2}\) cup of sugar
\(2\frac{1}{4}\) cups of flour





\(\frac{1}{2}\) tsp of salt
1 egg
1 tsp vanilla extract

title: Spritz Cookies
text:
Directions

Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Beat together butter and sugar.
Mix the remaining ingredients.
Form desired shape on cookie sheet.
Bake 6 - 9 minutes until set but not brown.
Immediately remove from cookie sheets.

title: Spritz Cookies
text:
Chocolate Sprits
Stir in 2 ounces melted unsweetened chocolate (cool) into butter mixture.
